Package game

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
game.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
The GameEnvironment contains everything else in the game and keeps track of game status, specifically it contains the Player entity, Shop entity, the battles the player can participate in and the number of days, current day and difficulty. It also contains behaviour to update the battles and the pre and post day logic.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Player>
    battles

    The current day, should start at 1.

    The Player entity.
    private Shop
    shop
    The Shop entity.
    private Monster
    wildMonster
    The wildMonster if there is a wild battle on the current day, else is null.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameEnvironment()
    Constructs a default GameEnvironment, with a default empty player, zero days, initializes the current day to 1, the difficulty to normal, initializes the shop and battle containers.

    Simple getter for the wildMonster.
    ArrayList<String>
    postDayLogic()
    Carries out all events after each day ends, checking for level ups for each monster in the player's team, and checking for the random events of monsters leaving or joining the player's team.
    void
    preDayLogic()
    Increments the day, refreshes the player team, refreshes the stock of the shop, and updates the battles.

    Simple setter for the difficulty.

    Setter for the player.
    void
    setWildBattleMonster(Monster newMonst)
    Simple setter for the wild battle monster.
    void
    updateBattles()
    Updates the days battles, based on the current day and difficulty, wild battles occur every 3 days, and the number of battles is 3 in the early days, and up to 5 by the end of the game.

    • getBattles

      public ArrayList<Player> getBattles()
      Simple getter for the battles on the current day.
      Returns:
      ArrayList. The enemy players on the current day.

    • updateBattles

      public void updateBattles()
      Updates the days battles, based on the current day and difficulty, wild battles occur every 3 days, and the number of battles is 3 in the early days, and up to 5 by the end of the game.

    • preDayLogic

      public void preDayLogic()
      Increments the day, refreshes the player team, refreshes the stock of the shop, and updates the battles.

    • postDayLogic

      public ArrayList<String> postDayLogic()
      Carries out all events after each day ends, checking for level ups for each monster in the player's team, and checking for the random events of monsters leaving or joining the player's team. Returns messages describing the events that took place.
      Returns:
      ArrayList. An array of messages detailing the random events that took place.
